pullrequest.title: Unicode strings and other Python 3 forward-compatible changes.

content.raw:
Very nice! This will definitly help with the python 3 port.
Sadly the execfile replacement introduces new bugs.
Non unicode filenames give me the following traceback(after removing the try catch):

```
#!python

  File "analysis_subprocess.py", line 294, in do_analysis
    code = compile(f.read(), os.path.basename(self.filepath), 'exec')
UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\u0308' in position 1: ordinal not in range(128)
```
content.html:
